trans-unit.source: Unknown option `{0}`. Please check `$(AndroidAapt2CompileExtraArgs)` and `$(AndroidAapt2LinkExtraArgs)` to see if they include any `aapt` command line arguments that are no longer valid for `aapt2` and ensure that all other arguments are valid for `aapt2`.
trans-unit.target: Неизвестный параметр "{0}". Проверьте "$(AndroidAapt2CompileExtraArgs)" и "$(AndroidAapt2LinkExtraArgs)", чтобы проверить, содержат ли они аргументы командной строки "aapt", которые больше не являются допустимыми для "aapt2", и убедитесь, что все остальные аргументы являются допустимыми для "aapt2".
trans-unit.note: The following are literal names and should not be translated: `aapt`, `aapt2`, `$(AndroidAapt2CompileExtraArgs)`, `$(AndroidAapt2LinkExtraArgs)` {0} - The invalid option name

trans-unit.source: Invalid file name: It must contain only {0}.
trans-unit.target: Недопустимое имя файла: оно должно содержать только {0}.
trans-unit.note: {0} - The regular expression that the file name must match

trans-unit.source: Invalid file name: It must contain only {0}.
trans-unit.target: Недопустимое имя файла: оно должно содержать только {0}.
trans-unit.note: {0} - The regular expression that the file name must match

trans-unit.source:
{0}.
This error is likely caused by an issue with the AndroidManifest.xml file or an Android manifest generation attribute in a source code file.
trans-unit.target:
{0}.
This error is likely caused by an issue with the AndroidManifest.xml file or an Android manifest generation attribute in a source code file.
trans-unit.note: {0} - The error message returned by the AAPT or AAPT2 tool

trans-unit.source: Invalid file name: It must start with A-z or a-z or an underscore.
trans-unit.target: Invalid file name: It must start with A-z or a-z or an underscore.

trans-unit.source: Java SDK {0} or above is required when using .NET 6 or higher. Download the latest JDK at: https://aka.ms/msopenjdk
trans-unit.target: Java SDK {0} or above is required when using .NET 6 or higher. Download the latest JDK at: https://aka.ms/msopenjdk
trans-unit.note: {0} - The Java SDK version number

trans-unit.source: Disabling the interpreter; using the interpreter and AOT at the same time is not supported. Use the interpreter for hot reload support in Debug configurations and AOT for Release configurations.
trans-unit.target: Disabling the interpreter; using the interpreter and AOT at the same time is not supported. Use the interpreter for hot reload support in Debug configurations and AOT for Release configurations.
trans-unit.note: The following are literal names and should not be translated: AOT, Debug, Release.

trans-unit.source: '{0}' is using a deprecated debug information level. Set the debugging information to Portable in the Visual Studio project property pages or edit the project file in a text editor and set the 'DebugType' MSBuild property to 'portable' to use the newer, cross-platform debug information level. If this file comes from a NuGet package, update to a newer version of the NuGet package or notify the library author.
trans-unit.target: '{0}' is using a deprecated debug information level. Set the debugging information to Portable in the Visual Studio project property pages or edit the project file in a text editor and set the 'DebugType' MSBuild property to 'portable' to use the newer, cross-platform debug information level. If this file comes from a NuGet package, update to a newer version of the NuGet package or notify the library author.
trans-unit.note: The following are literal names and should not be translated: 'DebugType', 'portable' The capitalized word "Portable" that appears earlier in the message is plain text and should be translated, but the lowercase word "portable" later in the message is a literal value and should not be translated. {0} - The file name of a deprecated symbol file

trans-unit.source: Using AAPT is deprecated in favor of AAPT2. Please enable 'Use incremental Android packaging system (aapt2)' in the Visual Studio project property pages or edit the project file in a text editor and set the 'AndroidUseAapt2' MSBuild property to 'true'.
trans-unit.target: Using AAPT is deprecated in favor of AAPT2. Please enable 'Use incremental Android packaging system (aapt2)' in the Visual Studio project property pages or edit the project file in a text editor and set the 'AndroidUseAapt2' MSBuild property to 'true'.
trans-unit.note: The following are literal names and should not be translated: AAPT, AAPT2, Android, AndroidUseAapt2, true.

trans-unit.source: Using AAPT is not supported in Xamarin.Android projects that target .NET 6 or higher. Please enable 'Use incremental Android packaging system (aapt2)' in the Visual Studio project property pages or edit the project file in a text editor and set the 'AndroidUseAapt2' MSBuild property to 'true'.
trans-unit.target: Using AAPT is not supported in Xamarin.Android projects that target .NET 6 or higher. Please enable 'Use incremental Android packaging system (aapt2)' in the Visual Studio project property pages or edit the project file in a text editor and set the 'AndroidUseAapt2' MSBuild property to 'true'.
trans-unit.note: The following are literal names and should not be translated: AAPT, Android, AndroidUseAapt2, true.

trans-unit.source: The 'EnableProguard' MSBuild property is set to 'true' and the 'AndroidLinkTool' MSBuild property is empty, so 'AndroidLinkTool' will default to 'proguard'.
trans-unit.target: The 'EnableProguard' MSBuild property is set to 'true' and the 'AndroidLinkTool' MSBuild property is empty, so 'AndroidLinkTool' will default to 'proguard'.
trans-unit.note: The following are literal names and should not be translated: 'EnableProguard', 'true', 'AndroidLinkTool', 'proguard'

trans-unit.source: The 'AndroidEnableProguard' MSBuild property is set to 'true' and the 'AndroidLinkTool' MSBuild property is empty, so 'AndroidLinkTool' will default to 'proguard'.
trans-unit.target: The 'AndroidEnableProguard' MSBuild property is set to 'true' and the 'AndroidLinkTool' MSBuild property is empty, so 'AndroidLinkTool' will default to 'proguard'.
trans-unit.note: The following are literal names and should not be translated: 'AndroidEnableProguard', 'true', 'AndroidLinkTool', 'proguard'

trans-unit.source: Support for the 'MONO_GC_PARAMS=bridge-implementation=old' value will be removed in .NET 7.
trans-unit.target: Support for the 'MONO_GC_PARAMS=bridge-implementation=old' value will be removed in .NET 7.

trans-unit.source: The <AndroidNamespaceReplacement> for '{0}' does not specify a 'Replacement' attribute.
trans-unit.target: The <AndroidNamespaceReplacement> for '{0}' does not specify a 'Replacement' attribute.
trans-unit.note: The following are literal names and should not be translated: <AndroidNamespaceReplacement> {0} - The AndroidNamespaceReplacement MSBuild value.

trans-unit.source: Native library '{0}' will not be bundled because it has an unsupported ABI. Move this file to a directory with a valid Android ABI name such as 'libs/armeabi-v7a/'.
trans-unit.target: Native library '{0}' will not be bundled because it has an unsupported ABI. Move this file to a directory with a valid Android ABI name such as 'libs/armeabi-v7a/'.
trans-unit.note: In this message, the term "bundled" is a short way of saying "included into the final application package." The following are literal names and should not be translated: ABI, 'libs/armeabi-v7a/' {0} - The file path

trans-unit.source: Cannot determine ABI of native library '{0}'. Remove the '{1}' NuGet package, or notify the library author.
trans-unit.target: Cannot determine ABI of native library '{0}'. Remove the '{1}' NuGet package, or notify the library author.
trans-unit.note: The following are literal names and should not be translated: ABI, NuGet {0} - The native library file path {1} - Either the name of the NuGet package or a path to the native library

trans-unit.source: The built-in '{0}' reference has been deprecated. Remove the '{0}' reference from your project and add the '{1}' NuGet package instead.
trans-unit.target: The built-in '{0}' reference has been deprecated. Remove the '{0}' reference from your project and add the '{1}' NuGet package instead.
trans-unit.note: The following are literal names and should not be translated: {0} - The Assembly name which is deprecated {1} - A Nuget package name.

trans-unit.source: `{0}` is empty. A value for `{0}` should be provided.
trans-unit.target: `{0}` is empty. A value for `{0}` should be provided.
trans-unit.note: {0} - The MSBuildProperty which contains a value.

trans-unit.source: Directory '{0}' is from '{1}'.
trans-unit.target: Directory '{0}' is from '{1}'.
trans-unit.note: {0} - A Directory Path. {1} - A Filename.

trans-unit.source: This code was generated by a tool. It was generated from {0} Changes to this file may cause incorrect behavior and will be lost if the contents are regenerated.
trans-unit.target: This code was generated by a tool. It was generated from {0} Changes to this file may cause incorrect behavior and will be lost if the contents are regenerated.
trans-unit.note: {0} - The path of the template file.

trans-unit.source: Could not determine API level for $(TargetFrameworkVersion) of '{0}'.
trans-unit.target: Не удалось определить уровень API для $(TargetFrameworkVersion) "{0}".
trans-unit.note: The following are literal names and should not be translated: $(TargetFrameworkVersion) {0} - The current value of $(TargetFrameworkVersion)

trans-unit.source: Could not determine $(AndroidApiLevel) or $(TargetFrameworkVersion); should not be reached.
trans-unit.target: Не удалось определить $(AndroidApiLevel) или $(TargetFrameworkVersion). Отображение этого сообщения не ожидается при нормальном использовании.
trans-unit.note: The following are literal names and should not be translated: $(AndroidApiLevel), $(TargetFrameworkVersion) In this message, the phrase "should not be reached" means that this error message is not expected to appear in normal usage.

trans-unit.source: Unhandled exception: {0}
trans-unit.target: Необработанное исключение: {0}
trans-unit.note: {0} - The exception message of the associated exception

trans-unit.source: Could not determine $(TargetFrameworkVersion) for API level '{0}.'
trans-unit.target: Не удалось определить $(TargetFrameworkVersion) для уровня API "{0}".
trans-unit.note: The following are literal names and should not be translated: $(TargetFrameworkVersion) {0} - The API level number

trans-unit.source: Unsupported or invalid $(TargetFrameworkVersion) value of '{0}'. Please update your Project Options.
trans-unit.target: Неподдерживаемое или недопустимое значение $(TargetFrameworkVersion) "{0}". Измените параметры проекта.
trans-unit.note: The following are literal names and should not be translated: $(TargetFrameworkVersion)

trans-unit.source: Could not find mono.android.jar
trans-unit.target: Не удалось найти mono.android.jar.
trans-unit.note: The following are literal names and should not be translated: mono.android.jar

trans-unit.source: Invalid `android:versionCode` value `{0}` in `AndroidManifest.xml`. It must be an integer value.
trans-unit.target: Недопустимое значение "android:versionCode" "{0}" в "AndroidManifest.xml". Значение должно быть целым числом.
trans-unit.note: The following are literal names and should not be translated: `android:versionCode`, `AndroidManifest.xml`

trans-unit.source: Invalid `android:versionCode` value `{0}` in `AndroidManifest.xml`. The value must be in the range of 0 to {1}.
trans-unit.target: Недопустимое значение "android:versionCode" "{0}" в "AndroidManifest.xml". Значение должно быть целым числом в диапазоне от 0 до {1}.
trans-unit.note: The following are literal names and should not be translated: `android:versionCode`, `AndroidManifest.xml` {0} - The current value {1} - The maximum allowed value

trans-unit.source: Building with JDK version `{0}` is not supported. Please install JDK version `{1}`. See https://aka.ms/xamarin/jdk9-errors
trans-unit.target: Сборка с использованием версии JDK "{0}" не поддерживается. Установите версию JDK "{1}". Дополнительные сведения см. на странице https://aka.ms/xamarin/jdk9-errors
trans-unit.note: The abbreviation "JDK" should not be translated.

trans-unit.source: Java SDK {0} or above is required when using {1}. Download the latest JDK at: https://aka.ms/msopenjdk Note: the Android Designer is incompatible with Java SDK 11.0: https://aka.ms/vs2019-and-jdk-11
trans-unit.target: При использовании компонента {1} требуется пакет SDK для Java как минимум версии {0}.
trans-unit.note: {0} - The Java SDK version number {1} - The feature being used: `$(TargetFrameworkVersion) v10.0`

trans-unit.source: Java SDK {0} or above is required when using Android SDK Build-Tools {1}.
trans-unit.target: При использовании Android SDK Build-Tools {1} требуется пакет SDK для Java версии {0} или более поздней версии.
trans-unit.note: The following are literal names and should not be translated: Android SDK Build-Tools {0} - The Java SDK version number {1} - The Android SDK Build-Tools version number

trans-unit.source: Failed to get the Java SDK version because the returned value does not appear to contain a valid version number. `{0} -version` returned: ```{1}```
trans-unit.target: Не удалось получить версию пакета SDK для Java, поскольку возвращаемое значение не содержит допустимый номер версии. Команда "{0} -version" возвратила "{1}"
trans-unit.note: The following are literal names and should not be translated: `{0} -version`, ```{1}``` {0} - The name of the Java command {1} - The output of the command

trans-unit.source: Failed to get the Java SDK version. Please ensure you have Java {0} or above installed.
trans-unit.target: Не удалось получить версию пакета SDK для Java. Убедитесь, что на компьютере установлен пакет Java {0} или более поздней версии.
trans-unit.note: {0} - The Java version number

trans-unit.source: Unable to determine the Android ABI from the value '{0}'. Edit the project file in a text editor and set the 'RuntimeIdentifiers' MSBuild property to contain only valid identifiers for the Android platform.
trans-unit.target: Не удалось определить ABI для Android по значению "{0}". Откройте файл проекта в текстовом редакторе и измените свойство MSBuild "RuntimeIdentifiers" так, чтобы оно содержало только допустимые идентификаторы для платформы Android.
trans-unit.note: The following are literal names and should not be translated: Android, ABI, RuntimeIdentifiers, MSBuild {0} - The $(RuntimeIdentifier) supplied by the user.

trans-unit.source: The 'AndroidSupportedAbis' MSBuild property is no longer supported. Edit the project file in a text editor, remove any uses of 'AndroidSupportedAbis', and use the 'RuntimeIdentifiers' MSBuild property instead.
trans-unit.target: Свойство MSBuild "AndroidSupportedAbis" больше не поддерживается. Откройте файл проекта в текстовом редакторе, удалите все вхождения "AndroidSupportedAbis" и используйте вместо них свойство MSBuild "RuntimeIdentifiers".
trans-unit.note: The following are literal names and should not be translated: AndroidSupportedAbis, MSBuild, RuntimeIdentifiers

trans-unit.source: EmbeddedNativeLibrary '{0}' is invalid in Android Application projects. Please use AndroidNativeLibrary instead.
trans-unit.target: Библиотека EmbeddedNativeLibrary "{0}" недопустима в проектах приложений Android. Используйте библиотеку AndroidNativeLibrary.
trans-unit.note: The following are literal names and should not be translated: EmbeddedNativeLibrary, AndroidNativeLibrary {0} - The library name.

trans-unit.source: Invalid value for `$(AndroidSequencePointsMode)`: {0}
trans-unit.target: Недопустимое значение для "$(AndroidSequencePointsMode)": {0}
trans-unit.note: The following are literal names and should not be translated: `$(AndroidSequencePointsMode)`

trans-unit.source: The $(TargetFrameworkVersion) for {0} ({1}) is greater than the $(TargetFrameworkVersion) for the application project ({2}). Please increase the $(TargetFrameworkVersion) for the application project.
trans-unit.target: $(TargetFrameworkVersion) для {0} ({1}) выше $(TargetFrameworkVersion) для проекта приложения ({2}). Используйте более новую версию $(TargetFrameworkVersion) для проекта приложения.
trans-unit.note: The following are literal names and should not be translated: $(TargetFrameworkVersion) {0} - The file name of the library referenced by the application {1} - The target framework version number for the library {2} - The target framework version number for the application project

trans-unit.source: {0} is a Reference Assembly.
trans-unit.target: {0} является базовой сборкой.

trans-unit.source: Ignoring Reference Assembly `{0}`.
trans-unit.target: Базовая сборка "{0}" будет пропущена.
trans-unit.note: {0} - File name of the assembly.

trans-unit.source: Could not get version from '{0}'. Defaulting to 1.0
trans-unit.target: Не удалось получить версию из "{0}". Устанавливается версия по умолчанию (1.0).
trans-unit.note: {0} - The tool name

trans-unit.source: Unsupported version of AAPT2 found at path '{0}'. Open the project file in a text editor and remove the 'Aapt2ToolPath' MSBuild property or ensure it is set to a valid location.
trans-unit.target: Unsupported version of AAPT2 found at path '{0}'. Open the project file in a text editor and remove the 'Aapt2ToolPath' MSBuild property or ensure it is set to a valid location.
trans-unit.note: The following are literal names and should not be translated: AAPT2, Aapt2ToolPath, MSBuild

trans-unit.source: AAPT2 was not found at path '{0}'. Open the project file in a text editor and remove the 'Aapt2ToolPath' MSBuild property or ensure it is set to a valid location.
trans-unit.target: AAPT2 was not found at path '{0}'. Open the project file in a text editor and remove the 'Aapt2ToolPath' MSBuild property or ensure it is set to a valid location.
trans-unit.note: The following are literal names and should not be translated: AAPT2, Aapt2ToolPath, MSBuild

trans-unit.source: Google Play requires that new applications and updates must use a TargetFrameworkVersion of {0} (API level {1}) or above. You are currently targeting {2} (API level {3}).
trans-unit.target: Google Play requires that new applications and updates must use a TargetFrameworkVersion of {0} (API level {1}) or above. You are currently targeting {2} (API level {3}).
trans-unit.note: The following are literal names and should not be translated: TargetFrameworkVersion {0} - The required minimum TargetFrameworkVersion, such as 'v10.0' {1} - The required minimum API level number, such as '29' {2} - The specified TargetFrameworkVersion {3} - The specified API level number

trans-unit.source: Unable to find `EmbeddedResource` named `{0}`.
trans-unit.target: Не удалось найти "EmbeddedResource" с именем "{0}".
trans-unit.note: The following are literal names and should not be translated: EmbeddedResource {0} - The name of the missing resource

trans-unit.source: The TargetFrameworkVersion {0} is deprecated. Please update it to be v5.0 or higher.
trans-unit.target: Версия TargetFrameworkVersion {0} является нерекомендуемой. Обновите ее как минимум до v5.0.
trans-unit.note: The following are literal names and should not be translated: TargetFrameworkVersion, v5.0 {0} - The current value of TargetFrameworkVersion

trans-unit.source: Could not parse '{0}'
trans-unit.target: Не удалось проанализировать "{0}".
trans-unit.note: {0} - A NuGet target framework moniker string

trans-unit.source: Could not resolve `target` in lock file for '{0}'
trans-unit.target: Не удалось разрешить "Target" в файле блокировки для "{0}".
trans-unit.note:
The following are literal names and should not be translated: `target`
The term "lock file" comes from NuGet. For example, search for "UnauthorizedLockFail" in https://github.com/NuGet/NuGet.Build.Localization to see some example localizations of "lock file."
{0} - A NuGet target framework moniker string

trans-unit.source: Using Fast Deployment and Android App Bundles at the same time is not currently supported. Use Fast Deployment for Debug configurations and Android App Bundles for Release configurations.
trans-unit.target: Using Fast Deployment and Android App Bundles at the same time is not currently supported. Use Fast Deployment for Debug configurations and Android App Bundles for Release configurations.
trans-unit.note: The following are literal names and should not be translated: Android App Bundles

trans-unit.source: Using fast deployment and AOT at the same time is not recommended. Use fast deployment for Debug configurations and AOT for Release configurations.
trans-unit.target: Не рекомендуется использовать быстрое развертывание и AOT одновременно. Используйте быстрое развертывание для конфигураций отладки, а AOT — для конфигураций выпуска.
trans-unit.note: The following are literal names and should not be translated: AOT, Debug, Release.

trans-unit.source: Using fast deployment and the linker at the same time is not recommended. Use fast deployment for Debug configurations and the linker for Release configurations.
trans-unit.target: Не рекомендуется использовать быстрое развертывание и компоновщик одновременно. Используйте быстрое развертывание для конфигураций отладки, а компоновщик — для конфигураций выпуска.
trans-unit.note: The following are literal names and should not be translated: Debug, Release.

trans-unit.source: Using fast deployment and a code shrinker at the same time is not recommended. Use fast deployment for Debug configurations and a code shrinker for Release configurations.
trans-unit.target: Не рекомендуется использовать быстрое развертывание и средство сжатия кода одновременно. Используйте быстрое развертывание для конфигураций отладки и средство сжатия кода для конфигураций выпуска.
trans-unit.note: The following are literal names and should not be translated: Debug, Release.

trans-unit.source: Assembly '{0}' is using '[assembly: {1}]', which is no longer supported. Use a newer version of this NuGet package or notify the library author.
trans-unit.target: Сборка "{0}" использует "[assembly: {1}]", которая больше не поддерживается. Используйте более новую версию этого пакета NuGet или уведомите автора библиотеки.
trans-unit.note: The following are literal names and should not be translated: [assembly: {1}], NuGet {0} - The assembly name {1} - The unsupported attribute

trans-unit.source: Assembly '{0}' is using a deprecated attribute '[assembly: {1}]'. Use a newer version of this NuGet package or notify the library author.
trans-unit.target: Сборка "{0}" использует устаревший атрибут "[assembly: {1}]". Используйте более новую версию этого пакета NuGet или уведомите автора библиотеки.
trans-unit.note: The following are literal names and should not be translated: [assembly: {1}], NuGet

trans-unit.source: Removing {0} from {1}. Lint {2} does not support this check.
trans-unit.target: Идет удаление {0} из {1}. Lint {2} не поддерживает эту проверку.
trans-unit.note: The following are literal names and should not be translated: Lint When it appears in the middle of a sentence, "lint" is not capitalized. {0} - The literal name of a lint check, such as HardcodedDebugMode {1} - The literal name of the MSBuild property {2} - The lint version number

trans-unit.source: There was a problem parsing {0}. This is likely due to incomplete or invalid XML. Exception: {1}
trans-unit.target: Возникла проблема при синтаксическом анализе {0}. Возможная причина: неполный или недопустимый код XML. Исключение: {1}
trans-unit.note: {0} - The file name {1} - The exception message of the associated exception

trans-unit.source: AndroidResgen: Warning while updating resource XML '{0}': {1}
trans-unit.target: AndroidResgen: предупреждение при обновлении XML-файла ресурсов "{0}". {1}
trans-unit.note: The following are literal names and should not be translated: AndroidResgen {0} - The name of the XML file {1} - The exception message of the associated exception

trans-unit.source: The closest match found for '{0}' is '{1}', but the capitalization does not match. Please correct the capitalization.
trans-unit.target: Для "{0}" найдено ближайшее соответствие "{1}", однако регистр символов не совпадает. Необходимо исправить его.
trans-unit.note: {0} - The user-provided type name {1} - The type name found

trans-unit.source: Attempting basic type name matching for element with ID '{0}' and type '{1}'
trans-unit.target: Попытка сопоставления имени базового типа для элемента с идентификатором "{0}" и типом "{1}".
trans-unit.note: {0} - The Android resource ID name

trans-unit.source: If basic type name matching fails, please add a `xamarin:managedType` attribute to the element to specify the fully qualified managed type name of the element.
trans-unit.target: Если сопоставление имени базового типа не удается выполнить, добавьте к элементу атрибут "xamarin:managedType", чтобы указать полное имя управляемого типа элемента.
trans-unit.note: "xamarin:managedType" is a literal name and should not be translated.

trans-unit.source: The TargetFrameworkVersion (Android API level {0}) is higher than the targetSdkVersion ({1}). Please increase the `android:targetSdkVersion` in the `AndroidManifest.xml` so that the API levels match.
trans-unit.target: Версия TargetFrameworkVersion (уровень API Android {0}) больше версии targetSdkVersion ({1}). Увеличьте версию "android:targetSdkVersion" в файле "AndroidManifest.xml", чтобы уровни API совпадали.
trans-unit.note: The following are literal names and should not be translated: targetSdkVersion, TargetFrameworkVersion, android:targetSdkVersion, AndroidManifest.xml {0} - The target framework version number {1} - The target SDK version number

trans-unit.source: The minSdkVersion ({0}) is greater than the targetSdkVersion. Please change the value such that the minSdkVersion is less than or equal to the targetSdkVersion ({1}).
trans-unit.target: Версия minSdkVersion ({0}) больше версии targetSdkVersion. Измените значение таким образом, чтобы версия minSdkVersion была меньше или равна версии targetSdkVersion ({1}).
trans-unit.note: The following are literal names and should not be translated: minSdkVersion, targetSdkVersion {0} - The minimum SDK version number {1} - The target SDK version number

trans-unit.source: The TargetFrameworkVersion (Android API level {0}) is lower than the targetSdkVersion ({1}). Please increase the `$(TargetFrameworkVersion)` or decrease the `android:targetSdkVersion` in the `AndroidManifest.xml` so that the API levels match.
trans-unit.target: Версия TargetFrameworkVersion (уровень API Android {0}) меньше версии targetSdkVersion ({1}). Увеличьте версию "$(TargetFrameworkVersion)" или уменьшите "android:targetSdkVersion" в файле "AndroidManifest.xml", чтобы уровни API совпадали.
trans-unit.note: The following are literal names and should not be translated: targetSdkVersion, TargetFrameworkVersion, android:targetSdkVersion, AndroidManifest.xml {0} - The target framework version number {1} - The target SDK version number

trans-unit.source: Invalid `$(AndroidManifestPlaceholders)` value for Android manifest placeholders. Please use `key1=value1;key2=value2` format. The specified value was: `{0}`
trans-unit.target: Недопустимое значение "$(AndroidManifestPlaceholders)" для заполнителей манифеста Android. Используйте формат "ключ1=значение1;ключ2=значение2". Указано значение: "{0}".
trans-unit.note: The following are literal names and should not be translated: `$(AndroidManifestPlaceholders)`

trans-unit.source: Using ProGuard with the D8 DEX compiler is no longer supported. Please set the code shrinker to 'r8' in the Visual Studio project property pages or edit the project file in a text editor and set the 'AndroidLinkTool' MSBuild property to 'r8'.
trans-unit.target: Использование ProGuard с компилятором D8 DEX больше не поддерживается. Установите средство сжатия кода "r8" на страницах свойств проекта в Visual Studio или измените файл проекта в текстовом редакторе, установив значение "r8" для свойства MSBuild "AndroidLinkTool".
trans-unit.note: The following are literal names and should not be translated: ProGuard, D8, DEX, 'r8', 'AndroidLinkTool'

trans-unit.source: Included layout root element override ID '{0}' is not valid.
trans-unit.target: Включенный идентификатор переопределения корневого элемента макета "{0}" является недопустимым.
trans-unit.note: {0} - The Android resource ID name

trans-unit.source: Failed to parse ID of node '{0}' in the layout file '{1}'.
trans-unit.target: Не удалось проанализировать идентификатор узла "{0}" в файле макета "{1}".
trans-unit.note: {0} - The Android resource XML element name {1} - The path of the layout file

trans-unit.source: JAR library references with identical file names but different contents were found: {0}. Please remove any conflicting libraries from EmbeddedJar, InputJar and AndroidJavaLibrary.
trans-unit.target: Обнаружены ссылки на библиотеки JAR с одинаковыми именами файлов, но разным содержимым: {0}. Удалите конфликтующие библиотеки из EmbeddedJar, InputJar и AndroidJavaLibrary.
trans-unit.note: The following are literal names and should not be translated: JAR, EmbeddedJar, InputJar and AndroidJavaLibrary {0} - Comma-separated list of the conflicting JAR library file names

trans-unit.source: More than one Android Wear project is specified as the paired project. It can be at most one.
trans-unit.target: В качестве связанного проекта указано несколько проектов Android Wear. Такой проект может быть только один.
trans-unit.note: The following are literal names and should not be translated: Android Wear

trans-unit.source: Target Wear application's project '{0}' does not specify required 'AndroidManifest' project property.
trans-unit.target: В проекте целевого приложения Wear "{0}" не указано обязательное свойство проекта "AndroidManifest".
trans-unit.note: The following are literal names and should not be translated: Wear, AndroidManifest "Wear" is a short version of the full product name "Wear OS" and so should not be translated. {0} - The project file name

trans-unit.source: Target Wear application's AndroidManifest.xml does not specify required 'package' attribute.
trans-unit.target: В файле AndroidManifest.xml целевого приложения Wear не указан обязательный атрибут "package".
trans-unit.note: The following are literal names and should not be translated: Wear, AndroidManifest.xml, 'package' "Wear" is a short version of the full product name "Wear OS" and so should not be translated.

trans-unit.source: Specified AndroidManifest file does not exist: {0}.
trans-unit.target: Указанный файл AndroidManifest не существует: {0}.
trans-unit.note: The following are literal names and should not be translated: AndroidManifest {0} - The path of the specified AndroidManifest file

trans-unit.source: `LibraryProjectProperties` file `{0}` is located in a parent directory of the bindings project's intermediate output directory. Please adjust the path to use the original `project.properties` file directly from the Android library project directory.
trans-unit.target: Файл "LibraryProjectProperties" "{0}" находится в родительском каталоге промежуточного выходного каталога проекта привязок. Измените путь, чтобы использовать исходный файл "project.properties" непосредственно из каталога проекта библиотеки Android.
trans-unit.note: The following are literal names and should not be translated: LibraryProjectProperties, project.properties, Android In this message, the term "binding" means a piece of generated code that makes it easy to access an Android API written in Java from a Xamarin.Android project written in C# or F#. {0} - The path of the LibraryProjectProperties file

trans-unit.source: At least one Java library is required for binding. Check that a Java library is included in the project and has the appropriate build action: 'LibraryProjectZip' (for AAR or ZIP), 'EmbeddedJar', 'InputJar' (for JAR), or 'LibraryProjectProperties' (project.properties).
trans-unit.target: Для привязки требуется по меньшей мере одна библиотека Java. Убедитесь, что в проект включена библиотека Java, имеющая соответствующее действие сборки: "LibraryProjectZip" (для AAR или ZIP), "EmbeddedJar", "InputJar" (для JAR) или "LibraryProjectProperties" (project.properties).
trans-unit.note: The following are literal names and should not be translated: LibraryProjectZip, EmbeddedJar, InputJar, LibraryProjectProperties, project.properties

trans-unit.source: Specified source Java library not found: {0}
trans-unit.target: Указанная исходная библиотека Java не найдена: {0}
trans-unit.note: In this message, the term "source Java library" refers to the library that will be processed. In this case, the term "source" does not refer to "source code." {0} - The file name of the library

trans-unit.source: Specified reference Java library not found: {0}
trans-unit.target: Указанная справочная библиотека Java не найдена: {0}
trans-unit.note: In this message, the term "reference Java library" refers to a library that is included as a reference so that types from the library can be resolved during the build process. {0} - The file name of the library

trans-unit.source: Using the DX DEX Compiler is not supported. Please set the DEX compiler to 'd8' in the Visual Studio project property pages or edit the project file in a text editor and set the 'AndroidDexTool' MSBuild property to 'd8'.
trans-unit.target: Использование DEX-компилятора DX является нерекомендуемым. Установите компилятор DEX "d8" на страницах свойств проекта в Visual Studio или измените файл проекта в текстовом редакторе, задав значение "d8" для свойства MSBuild "AndroidDexTool".
trans-unit.note: The following are literal names and should not be translated: DX, DEX, d8, AndroidDexTool.

trans-unit.source: Ignoring configuration file '{0}'. .NET configuration files are not supported in Xamarin.Android projects that target .NET 6 or higher.
trans-unit.target: Пропуск файла конфигурации "{0}". Файлы конфигурации .NET не поддерживаются в проектах Xamarin.Android для .NET 5 и более поздних версий.
trans-unit.note: The following are literal names and should not be translated: .NET, Xamarin.Android. {0} - The file name such as 'Foo.dll.config'

trans-unit.source: The experimental 'Hybrid' value for the 'AndroidAotMode' MSBuild property is not currently compatible with the armeabi-v7a target ABI. To continue using the experimental 'Hybrid' value for 'AndroidAotMode', deselect the armeabi-v7a target ABI in the Visual Studio project property pages or edit the project file in a text editor and remove 'armeabi-v7a' from the 'AndroidSupportedAbis' MSBuild property.
trans-unit.target: The experimental 'Hybrid' value for the 'AndroidAotMode' MSBuild property is not currently compatible with the armeabi-v7a target ABI. To continue using the experimental 'Hybrid' value for 'AndroidAotMode', deselect the armeabi-v7a target ABI in the Visual Studio project property pages or edit the project file in a text editor and remove 'armeabi-v7a' from the 'AndroidSupportedAbis' MSBuild property.
trans-unit.note: The following are literal names and should not be translated: 'Hybrid', 'AndroidAotMode', armeabi-v7a, 'AndroidSupportedAbis'

trans-unit.source: Use of AppDomain.CreateDomain() detected in assembly: {0}. .NET 6 and higher will only support a single AppDomain, so this API will no longer be available in Xamarin.Android once .NET 6 is released.
trans-unit.target: В сборке обнаружено использование AppDomain.CreateDomain(): {0}. .NET 5 поддерживает только один домен AppDomain, поэтому этот API не будет доступен в Xamarin.Android после выпуска .NET 5.
trans-unit.note: The following are literal names and should not be translated: AppDomain.CreateDomain(), AppDomain {0} - The name of the assembly

trans-unit.source: Source file '{0}' could not be found.
trans-unit.target: Не удалось найти исходный файл "{0}".

trans-unit.source: Can not resolve reference: `{0}`, referenced by {1}. Perhaps it doesn't exist in the Mono for Android profile?
trans-unit.target: Не удается разрешить ссылку "{0}", на которую ссылается {1}. Возможно, она отсутствует в профиле Mono для Android.
trans-unit.note: {0} - The name of the missing assembly {1} - The chain of references that causes a reference to the missing assembly, with > as the separator between items. Example: `System.Memory` > `System.Buffers`

trans-unit.source: Can not resolve reference: `{0}`, referenced by {1}. Please add a NuGet package or assembly reference for `{0}`, or remove the reference to `{2}`.
trans-unit.target: Не удается разрешить ссылку "{0}", на которую ссылается {1}. Добавьте пакет NuGet или ссылку на сборку для "{0}" либо удалите ссылку на "{2}".
trans-unit.note: {0} - The name of the missing assembly {1} - The chain of references that causes a reference to the missing assembly, with > as the separator between items. Example: `System.Memory` > `System.Buffers` {2} - The name of the first assembly in the chain of references. Example: System.Memory

trans-unit.source: Could not resolve reference to '{0}' (defined in assembly '{1}') with scope '{2}'. When the scope is different from the defining assembly, it usually means that the type is forwarded.
trans-unit.target: Не удалось разрешить ссылку на "{0}" (определенную в сборке "{1}") с областью "{2}". Если область отличается от определяющей сборки, обычно это означает, что тип передается.
trans-unit.note: {0} - The member name, such as a class name {1} - The assembly name {2} - The scope of the member, such as the name of a different assembly

trans-unit.source: Exception while loading assemblies: {0}
trans-unit.target: Исключение при загрузке сборок: {0}.
trans-unit.note: {0} - The exception message of the associated exception

trans-unit.source: In referenced assembly {0}, Java.Interop.DoNotPackageAttribute requires non-null file name.
trans-unit.target: В сборке {0}, на которую указывает ссылка, для Java.Interop.DoNotPackageAttribute требуется имя файла, отличное от NULL.
trans-unit.note: The following are literal names and should not be translated: Java.Interop.DoNotPackageAttribute {0} - The assembly name

trans-unit.source: Could not AOT the assembly: {0}
trans-unit.target: Не удалось выполнить AOT для сборки: {0}
trans-unit.note: The abbreviation "AOT" should not be translated.

trans-unit.source: Invalid AOT mode: {0}
trans-unit.target: Недопустимый режим AOT: {0}
trans-unit.note: The abbreviation "AOT" should not be translated.

trans-unit.source: Could not strip IL of assembly: {0}
trans-unit.target: Не удалось удалить промежуточный язык сборки: {0}
trans-unit.note: The abbreviation "IL" should not be translated.

trans-unit.source: Android NDK r10d is buggy and provides an incompatible x86_64 libm.so. See https://code.google.com/p/android/issues/detail?id=161422.
trans-unit.target: Android NDK r10d содержит ошибки и предоставляет несовместимый пакет x86_64 libm.so. См. https://code.google.com/p/android/issues/detail?id=161422.
trans-unit.note: The following are literal names and should not be translated: NDK, r10d, x86_64, libm.so "r10d" is the problematic version of the NDK. "x86_64" is the architecture of the libm.so file.

trans-unit.source: The detected Android NDK version is incompatible with the targeted LLVM configuration. Please upgrade to NDK r10d or newer.
trans-unit.target: Обнаруженная версия Android NDK несовместима с целевой конфигурацией LLVM. Выполните обновление до NDK r10d или более поздней версии.
trans-unit.note: The following are literal names and should not be translated: NDK, LLVM, r10d "r10d" is the version of the NDK.

trans-unit.source: Could not compile native assembly file: {0}
trans-unit.target: Не удалось скомпилировать файл собственной сборки: {0}
trans-unit.note: In this message, the term "assembly" means the low-level language that an assembler like `as` takes as input. (This is different from most of the other messages, where the term "assembly" means the file type that the C# compiler produces.)

trans-unit.source: Could not link native shared library: {0}
trans-unit.target: Не удалось связать собственную общую библиотеку: {0}

trans-unit.source: Failed to generate Java type for class: {0} due to {1}
trans-unit.target: Не удалось создать тип Java для класса {0}, так как возникло исключение {1}
trans-unit.note: {0} - The managed type name {1} - The exception message of the associated exception

trans-unit.source: Please add a reference to Mono.Android.Export.dll when using ExportAttribute or ExportFieldAttribute.
trans-unit.target: При использовании ExportAttribute или ExportFieldAttribute добавьте ссылку на Mono.Android.Export.dll.
trans-unit.note: The following are literal names and should not be translated: Mono.Android.Export.dll, ExportAttribute, ExportFieldAttribute.

trans-unit.source: AndroidManifest.xml //uses-sdk/@android:targetSdkVersion '{0}' is less than $(TargetFrameworkVersion) '{1}'. Using API-{2} for ACW compilation.
trans-unit.target: Версия AndroidManifest.xml //uses-sdk/@android:targetSdkVersion "{0}" ниже версии $(TargetFrameworkVersion) "{1}". Использование API-{2} для компиляции ACW.
trans-unit.note: The following are literal names and should not be translated: AndroidManifest.xml, //uses-sdk/@android:targetSdkVersion , $(TargetFrameworkVersion), API-{2}, ACW {0} - The target SDK version number {1} - The target framework version number {2} - The API version number

trans-unit.source: The type '{0}' must provide a public default constructor
trans-unit.target: Тип "{0}" должен предоставлять открытый конструктор по умолчанию.

trans-unit.source: The managed type `{0}` exists in multiple assemblies: {1}. Please refactor the managed type names in these assemblies so that they are not identical.
trans-unit.target: Управляемый тип "{0}" существует в нескольких сборках: {1}. Выполните рефакторинг имен управляемых типов в этих сборках, чтобы они не совпадали.
trans-unit.note: {0} - The managed type name {1} - Comma-separated list of all the assemblies where the managed type exists

trans-unit.source: References to the type `{0}` will refer to `{0}, {1}`.
trans-unit.target: Ссылки на тип "{0}" будут ссылаться на "{0}, {1}".
trans-unit.note: The phrase "`{0}, {1}`" does not need to be translated. {0} - The managed type name {1} - The name of the library that contains the type

trans-unit.source: The Java type `{0}` is generated by more than one managed type. Please change the [Register] attribute so that the same Java type is not emitted.
trans-unit.target: Тип Java "{0}" создан несколькими управляемыми типами. Измените атрибут [Register] так, чтобы один и тот же тип Java не создавался.
trans-unit.note: The following are literal names and should not be translated: Java, [Register]

trans-unit.source: `{0}` generated by: {1}
trans-unit.target: Имя типа: "{0}", создан: {1}
trans-unit.note: The two spaces indentation at the beginning of this message should be preserved in the translations where possible. {0} - The generated Java type name {1} - The managed type name

trans-unit.source: AndroidManifest.xml //uses-sdk/@android:minSdkVersion '{0}' is less than API-{1}, this configuration is not supported.
trans-unit.target: Версия AndroidManifest.xml //uses-sdk/@android:minSdkVersion "{0}" ниже версии API-{1}, эта конфигурация не поддерживается.

trans-unit.source: AndroidManifest.xml //uses-sdk/@android:targetSdkVersion '{0}' is less than API-{1}, this configuration is not supported.
trans-unit.target: Версия AndroidManifest.xml //uses-sdk/@android:targetSdkVersion "{0}" ниже версии API-{1}, эта конфигурация не поддерживается.

trans-unit.source: Unable to find //manifest/application/uses-library at path: {0}
trans-unit.target: Не удалось найти //manifest/application/uses-library по пути: {0}
trans-unit.note: The following are literal names and should not be translated: //manifest/application/uses-library

trans-unit.source: Cannot find binding generator for language {0} or {1}.
trans-unit.target: Не удается найти генератор привязки для языка {0} или {1}.
trans-unit.note: In this message, the term "binding" means a piece of code that makes it easy to access a certain kind of data that is originally stored outside of the target programming language, which is usually C#. {0} - The target programming language name, which is usually C# {1} - The default programming language name, which is also usually C#

trans-unit.source: Partial class item '{0}' does not have an associated binding for layout '{1}'.
trans-unit.target: С элементом разделяемого класса "{0}" не связана привязка для макета "{1}".
trans-unit.note: In this message, the term "partial class item" means a .NET partial class. In this message, the term "binding" means a piece of code that makes it easy to access a certain kind of data that is originally stored outside of the target programming language, which is usually C#. In this mesage, the term "layout" means an Android UI layout. {1} - The path of the partial class file {0} - The name of the layout

trans-unit.source: No layout binding source files were generated.
trans-unit.target: Не были созданы исходные файлы привязки макета.
trans-unit.note: In this message, the term "binding" means a piece of code that makes it easy to access a certain kind of data that is originally stored outside of the target programming language, which is usually C#. In this mesage, the term "layout" means an Android UI layout. In this message, the term "source files" means files that can be compiled, usually containing C# source code.

trans-unit.source: No widgets found for layout ({0}).
trans-unit.target: Не найдены мини-приложения для макета ({0}).
trans-unit.note: In this message, the term "widgets" means Android UI elements. In this mesage, the term "layout" means an Android UI layout. {0} - Semicolon-separated list of paths for the files that define the layout

trans-unit.source: Malformed full class name '{0}'. Missing namespace.
trans-unit.target: Полное имя класса "{0}" сформировано неправильно. Отсутствует пространство имен.
trans-unit.note: {0} - The class name

trans-unit.source: Malformed full class name '{0}'. Missing class name.
trans-unit.target: Полное имя класса "{0}" сформировано неправильно. Отсутствует имя класса.
trans-unit.note: {0} - The class name

trans-unit.source: Widget '{0}' in layout '{1}' has multiple instances with different types. The property type will be set to: {2}
trans-unit.target: Мини-приложение "{0}" в макете "{1}" содержит несколько экземпляров с разными типами. Будет установлен тип свойства {2}
trans-unit.note: In this message, the term "widgets" means Android UI elements. In this mesage, the term "layout" means an Android UI layout. {0} - The name of the widget {1} - The name of the layout {2} - The type name that will be used, such as "object"

trans-unit.source: Resource item '{0}' does not have the required metadata item '{1}'.
trans-unit.target: Элемент ресурса "{0}" не включает необходимый элемент метаданных "{1}".
trans-unit.note: {0} - The name of the Android layout resource file {1} - The name of the metadata item

trans-unit.source: Unable to find specified //activity-alias/@android:targetActivity: '{0}'
trans-unit.target: Не найдено указанное действие //activity-alias/@android:targetActivity: "{0}".
trans-unit.note: The following are literal names and should not be translated: //activity-alias/@android:targetActivity {0} - The specified targetActivity name

trans-unit.source: Unrecognized `TransformFile` root element: {0}.
trans-unit.target: Нераспознанный корневой элемент "TransformFile": {0}.
trans-unit.note: The following are literal names and should not be translated: TransformFile In this message, "root element" refers to the root element of an XML file. {0} - The name of the root element

trans-unit.source: Error parsing XML: {0}
trans-unit.target: Ошибка анализа XML: {0}
trans-unit.note: {0} - The exception message and stack trace of the associated exception

trans-unit.source: The Android class parser value '{0}' is deprecated and will be removed in a future version of Xamarin.Android. Update the project properties to use 'class-parse'.
trans-unit.target: Значение "{0}" синтаксического анализатора класса Android является устаревшим и будет удалено в следующей версии Xamarin.Android. Обновите свойства проекта, чтобы использовать "class-parse".
trans-unit.note: The following are literal names and should not be translated: class-parse {0} - The name of the current class parser value

trans-unit.source: The Android code generation target '{0}' is deprecated and will be removed in a future version of Xamarin.Android. Update the project properties to use 'XAJavaInterop1'.
trans-unit.target: Целевой объект "{0}" создания кода Android является устаревшим и будет удален в следующей версии Xamarin.Android. Обновите свойства проекта, чтобы использовать "XAJavaInterop1".
trans-unit.note: The following are literal names and should not be translated: XAJavaInterop1 {0} - The name of the current code generation target

trans-unit.source: APK already contains the item {0}; ignoring.
trans-unit.target: Пакет APK уже содержит элемент {0}; он будет пропущен.
trans-unit.note: The abbreviation "APK" should not be translated. {0} - The file name.

trans-unit.source: Cannot determine ABI of native library '{0}'. Move this file to a directory with a valid Android ABI name such as 'libs/armeabi-v7a/'.
trans-unit.target: Невозможно определить ABI для собственной библиотеки {0}.
trans-unit.note: The following are literal names and should not be translated: ABI, 'libs/armeabi-v7a/' {0} - The file path

trans-unit.source: Could not determine ABI of some native libraries. Ignoring those: {0}
trans-unit.target: Не удалось определить ABI для некоторых собственных библиотек. Следующие будут пропущены: {0}.
trans-unit.note: The abbreviation "ABI" should not be translated. {0} - Comma-separated list of the ignored library file names.

trans-unit.source: Unhandled exception merging `AndroidManifest.xml`: {0}
trans-unit.target: Слияние необработанных исключений "AndroidManifest.xml": {0}
trans-unit.note: The following are literal names and should not be translated: `AndroidManifest.xml` {0} - The exception message of the associated exception

trans-unit.source: Error extracting resources from "{0}": {1}
trans-unit.target: Ошибка при извлечении ресурсов из "{0}": {1}
trans-unit.note: {0} - The file name {1} - The exception message of the associated exception

trans-unit.source: ProGuard configuration file '{0}' was not found.
trans-unit.target: Не удалось найти файл конфигурации ProGuard "{0}".
trans-unit.note: The following are literal names and should not be translated: ProGuard

trans-unit.source: Multidex is enabled, but `$(_AndroidMainDexListFile)` is empty.
trans-unit.target: Multidex включен, но "$(_AndroidMainDexListFile)" пуст.
trans-unit.note: The following are literal names and should not be translated: Multidex, $(_AndroidMainDexListFile)

trans-unit.source: Multidex is enabled, but the `$(_AndroidMainDexListFile)` file '{0}' does not exist.
trans-unit.target: Multidex включен, но файл "$(_AndroidMainDexListFile)" "{0}" не существует.
trans-unit.note: The following are literal names and should not be translated: Multidex, $(_AndroidMainDexListFile)

trans-unit.source: R8 does not support `@(MultiDexMainDexList)` files when android:minSdkVersion >= 21
trans-unit.target: R8 не поддерживает файлы "@(MultiDexMainDexList)", если android:minSdkVersion >= 21.
trans-unit.note: The following are literal names and should not be translated: R8, @(MultiDexMainDexList), android:minSdkVersion

trans-unit.source: Invalid ProGuard configuration file. {0}
trans-unit.target: Недопустимый файл конфигурации ProGuard. {0}
trans-unit.note: The following are literal names and should not be translated: ProGuard {0} - The error message returned by the ProGuard tool.

trans-unit.source: Failed to generate type maps
trans-unit.target: Не удалось создать сопоставления типов.

trans-unit.source: 'MultiDexMainDexList' file '{0}' does not exist.
trans-unit.target: Файл MultiDexMainDexList "{0}" не существует.
trans-unit.note: The following are literal names and should not be translated: MultiDexMainDexList

trans-unit.source: `{0}` file `{1}` could not be found.
trans-unit.target: `{0}` file `{1}` could not be found.
trans-unit.note: {0} - The MSBuildProperty which contains the file name value. {1} - The value of the MSBuildProperty. Normally a filename.

trans-unit.source: The application won't contain the paired Wear package because the Wear application package APK is not created yet. If building on the command line, be sure to build the "SignAndroidPackage" target.
trans-unit.target: Приложение не будет содержать связанный пакет Wear, так как пакет APK приложения Wear еще не создан. При сборке в командной строке необходимо выполнить сборку целевого объекта "SignAndroidPackage".
trans-unit.note: The following are literal names and should not be translated: Wear, APK, SignAndroidPackage "Wear" is a short version of the full product name "Wear OS" and so should not be translated.

trans-unit.source: Referencing the Android Wear application project '{0}' from an Android application project is deprecated and will no longer be supported in a future version of Xamarin.Android. Remove the Android Wear application project reference from the Android application project and distribute the Wear application as a standalone application instead.
trans-unit.target: Использование ссылки на проект приложения Android Wear "{0}" из проекта приложения Android является нерекомендуемым, и в будущей версии Xamarin.Android поддержка такой ссылки будет прекращена. Удалите ссылку на проект приложения Android Wear из проекта приложения Android и распространяйте приложение Wear в качестве автономного приложения.
trans-unit.note: The following are literal names and should not be translated: Android Wear, Android, Wear. {0} - The referenced Android Wear project.

trans-unit.source: Missing Android NDK toolchains directory '{0}'. Please install the Android NDK.
trans-unit.target: Отсутствует каталог цепочек инструментов Android NDK "{0}". Установите Android NDK.
trans-unit.note: {0} - The path of the missing directory

trans-unit.source: C compiler for target {0} was not found. Tried paths: "{1}"
trans-unit.target: Компилятор C для целевой архитектуры {0} не найден. Проверенные пути: "{1}".
trans-unit.note: The following are literal names and should not be translated: C {0} - The target architecture, such as Arm, Arm64, or X86_64 {1} - Semicolon-separated list of the paths searched

trans-unit.source: Toolchain directory for target {0} was not found.
trans-unit.target: Каталог цепочки инструментов для целевой архитектуры {0} не найден.
trans-unit.note: {0} - The target architecture, such as Arm, Arm64, or X86_64

trans-unit.source: Conversion from assembly to native code failed. Exit code {0}
trans-unit.target: Не удалось выполнить преобразование из сборки в машинный код. Код выхода: {0}.
trans-unit.note: In this message, the term "assembly" means the low-level language that an assembler like `as` takes as input. (This is different from most of the other messages, where the term "assembly" means the file type that the C# compiler produces.) {0} - The exit code number

trans-unit.source: NDK C compiler exited with an error. Exit code {0}
trans-unit.target: Компилятор NDK C завершил работу с ошибкой. Код выхода: {0}.
trans-unit.note: The following are literal names and should not be translated: NDK, C {0} - The exit code number

trans-unit.source: Could not locate the Android NDK. Please make sure the Android NDK is installed in the Android SDK Manager, or if using a custom NDK path, please ensure the $(AndroidNdkDirectory) MSBuild property is set to the custom path.
trans-unit.target: Не удалось найти Android NDK. Проверьте установку этого пакета в Диспетчере SDK Android, а если используется особый путь к NDK, этот путь должен быть задан в свойстве MSBuild $(AndroidNdkDirectory).
trans-unit.note: The following are literal names and should not be translated: $(AndroidNdkDirectory)

trans-unit.source: Toolchain utility '{0}' for target {1} was not found. Tried in path: "{2}"
trans-unit.target: Служебная программа "{0}" цепочки инструментов для целевой архитектуры {1} не найдена. Проверенный путь: "{2}".
trans-unit.note: {0} - The missing utility name, such as gcc or clang {1} - The target architecture, such as Arm, Arm64, or X86_64 {2} - The path of the directory that was searched

trans-unit.source: NDK linker exited with an error. Exit code {0}
trans-unit.target: Работа компоновщика NDK завершилась с ошибкой. Код выхода: {0}.
trans-unit.note: The following are literal names and should not be translated: NDK {0} - The exit code number

trans-unit.source: Cannot find `{0}`. Please install the Android SDK Build-Tools package with the `{1}{2}tools{2}{3}` program.
trans-unit.target: Не удается найти "{0}". Установите пакет Android SDK Build-Tools с программой "{1}{2}tools{2}{3}".
trans-unit.note: The following are literal names and should not be translated: Android SDK Build-Tools, {1}{2}tools{2}{3} {0} - The missing tool name {1} - The parent directory {2} - The directory separator character {3} - The installer program name

trans-unit.source: Cannot find `{0}` in the Android SDK. Please set its path via /p:LintToolPath.
trans-unit.target: Не удается найти "{0}" в пакете SDK для Android. Укажите путь к нему с помощью параметра /p:LintToolPath.
trans-unit.note: The following are literal names and should not be translated: /p:LintToolPath {0} - The missing tool name

trans-unit.source: Could not find android.jar for API level {0}. This means the Android SDK platform for API level {0} is not installed. Either install it in the Android SDK Manager ({2}), or change the Xamarin.Android project to target an API version that is installed. ({1} missing.)
trans-unit.target: Не удалось найти файл android.jar для уровня API {0}. Это означает, что платформа SDK для Android для уровня API {0} не установлена. Установите его в Диспетчере SDK Android ({2}) или измените проект Xamarin.Android, чтобы установленная версия API использовалась в нем в качестве целевой. (Отсутствует файл {1}.)
trans-unit.note: The following are literal names and should not be translated: android.jar {0} - The API level name {1} - The expected path of the android.jar file {2} - The menu location in Visual Studio that can be used to launch the Android SDK Manager

trans-unit.source: Tools > Android > Android SDK Manager...
trans-unit.target: Средства > Android > Диспетчер SDK Android…
trans-unit.note: This string is the location of a menu command in Visual Studio.

trans-unit.source: Tools > Open Android SDK Manager...
trans-unit.target: Средства > Открыть Диспетчер SDK Android…
trans-unit.note: This string is the location of a menu command in Visual Studio for Mac.

trans-unit.source: Embedded Wear app package name differs from handheld app package name ({0} != {1}).
trans-unit.target: Имя пакета приложения Wear для встроенных устройств отличается от имени пакета приложения для наладонных устройств ({0} != {1}).
trans-unit.note: The following are literal names and should not be translated: Wear "Wear" is a short version of the full product name "Wear OS" and so should not be translated. In this message, the term "handheld app" means "app for handheld devices." {0} - The Wear app package name {1} - The handheld app package name

trans-unit.source: java.lang.OutOfMemoryError. Consider increasing the value of $(JavaMaximumHeapSize). Java ran out of memory while executing '{0} {1}'
trans-unit.target: java.lang.OutOfMemoryError. Попробуйте увеличить значение $(JavaMaximumHeapSize). В Java недостаточно памяти для выполнения "{0} {1}"
trans-unit.note: The following are literal names and should not be translated: java.lang.OutOfMemoryError, $(JavaMaximumHeapSize) {0} - The tool name {1} - The command line arguments used for the tool

trans-unit.source: No Android platforms installed at '{0}'. Please install an SDK Platform with the `{1}{2}tools{2}{3}` program.
trans-unit.target: На "{0}" не установлены платформы Android. Установите SDK Platform с помощью программы "{1}{2}tools{2}{3}".
trans-unit.note: The following are literal names and should not be translated: SDK Platform, {1}{2}tools{2}{3} {0} - Android SDK platforms directory path {1} - Android SDK directory path {2} - The directory separator character {3} - The Android SDK installer program name

trans-unit.source: The Android SDK directory could not be found. Check that the Android SDK Manager in Visual Studio shows a valid installation. To use a custom SDK path for a command line build, set the 'AndroidSdkDirectory' MSBuild property to the custom path.
trans-unit.target: Не удалось найти каталог пакета SDK для Android. Укажите путь к нему с помощью параметра /p:AndroidSdkDirectory.
trans-unit.note: The following terms should not be translated: AndroidSdkDirectory

trans-unit.source: The Java SDK directory could not be found. Ensure that the Android section of the Visual Studio options has a valid Java SDK directory configured. To use a custom SDK path for a command line build, set the 'JavaSdkDirectory' MSBuild property to the custom path.
trans-unit.target: Не удалось найти каталог пакета SDK для Java. Укажите путь к нему с помощью параметра /p:JavaSdkDirectory.
trans-unit.note: The following terms should not be translated: JavaSdkDirectory

trans-unit.source: Failed to generate Java type for class: {0} due to MAX_PATH: {1}
trans-unit.target: Не удалось создать тип Java для класса {0} из-за MAX_PATH: {1}
trans-unit.note: The following are literal names and should not be translated: MAX_PATH. {0} - The managed type name {1} - The exception message of the associated exception

trans-unit.source: Two processes may be building this project at once. Lock file exists at path: {0}
trans-unit.target: Сборка этого проекта может одновременно осуществляться двумя процессами. Файл блокировки находится по следующему пути: {0}
